header.#text: Commissioner of United States Customs and Border Protection

text.#text: ensure the interdiction of persons and goods illegally entering or exiting the United States;
facilitate and expedite the flow of legitimate travelers and trade;

safeguard the borders of the United States to protect against the entry of dangerous goods while facilitating and expediting the flow of legitimate trade and travel;
